TypeSignature.Value: public class SearchView : Android.Widget.LinearLayout, Android.Views.ICollapsibleActionView, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable

.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SearchView extends Android.Widget.LinearLayout implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Android.Views.ICollapsibleActionView, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class System.IDisposable
type SearchView = class inherit LinearLayout interface ICollapsibleActionView interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable interface IJavaPeerable

Docs.summary: A widget that provides a user interface for the user to enter a search query and submit a request to a search provider.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool Iconified { get; set; }
member this.Iconified : bool with get, set

Docs.param: a true value will collapse the SearchView to an icon, while a false will expand it.
Docs.summary: Returns the current iconified state of the SearchView. -or- Iconifies or expands the SearchView.
Docs.value: true if the SearchView is currently iconified, false if the search field is fully visible.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool QueryRefinementEnabled { get; set; }
member this.QueryRefinementEnabled : bool with get, set

Docs.param: true if all items should have a query refinement button, false if only those items that have a query refinement flag set should have the button.
Docs.summary: Returns whether query refinement is enabled for all items or only specific ones. -or- Specifies if a query refinement button should be displayed alongside each suggestion or if it should depend on the flags set in the individual items retrieved from the suggestions provider.
Docs.value: true if enabled for all items, false otherwise.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool SubmitButtonEnabled { get; set; }

Docs.param: true to show a submit button for submitting queries, false if a submit button is not required.
Docs.summary: Returns whether the submit button is enabled when necessary or never displayed. -or- Enables showing a submit button when the query is non-empty.
Docs.value: whether the submit button is enabled automatically when necessary
